#Ranking / prioritising

1) First, enter the choices you have to choose. Eg in choosing suitable car for you, you may have choices of Honda fit, Honda Airwave, Toyota Crown etc. You can add choices by clicking add button. You must add two or more choices / alternatives. 


2) And then, enter the criteria / standards you consider in choosing. Eg you may consider criteria of Safety, Cost, Style, Capacity in choosing a new car to buy. You can add criteria / standards by clicking add button. Then click Next>>.

3) Let's make pairwise comparisons of Criteria two by two with respect to the goal. You may have a goal of choosing something. Eg in choosing a new car to buy, my goal is " Getting the best car with an affordable price for my family ". Thus, you will have to make pairwise comparisons respecting goal, like Safety vs Cost, etc by selecting using a drop-down menu. Then, click Next button.


4) This time, let's make pairwise comparisons of choices / alternatives with respect to each Criterion. Eg you will see a sentence " Honda Fit is Extremely more favored over Honda Civic, in Safety ". Just select appropriate weight using drop-down menu. After making all comparisons, clicking Next. 


5) Here you go...You will see the results describing priority of each choice or alternative. Alternative/ choice with highest priority is the best choice for you.
